scripts.css-compile: rm -rf static/css && mkdir -p static/css && node_modules/stylus/bin/stylus --sourcemap --compress src/stylus/output --out static/css --use ./node_modules/nib/lib/nib
scripts.css-watch: rm -rf static/css && mkdir -p static/css && node_modules/stylus/bin/stylus --sourcemap --compress src/stylus/output --out static/css --use ./node_modules/nib/lib/nib --watch
scripts.css: npm run css-lint && npm run css-compile
scripts.js-compile: rm -rf static/js && mkdir -p static/js && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src/js/app/**/* -o static/js/bundle.js && NODE_ENV=$ENV node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -g envify -e static/js/bundle.js -o static/js/bundle.js && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs static/js/bundle.js -c -o static/js/bundle.js
scripts.js-watch: node_modules/watch-cli/bin/watch  -p src/js/app/**/* -c 'rm -rf static/js && mkdir -p static/js && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src/js/app/**/* -o static/js/bundle.js && NODE_ENV=development node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -g envify -e static/js/bundle.js -o static/js/bundle.js'
scripts.js: npm run js-lint && npm run js-compile
scripts.watch: npm run css-watch & npm run js-watch
